text:
Quick question. Looking to create multiple templates for blog posts. Can anyone steer me to a resource where I can create these layouts?

We have the page vs post layout, but the post layout we are trying to create 3 variations for use

Hi <@U2H23SN0Z>. (this might belong in general) What sort of variations are you requiring? Completely different looks or just some layout changes? You can turn sections on and off with HubL modules if that’s what you’re looking for.
my fault. will move there.  I will look at Hubl Modules that should take care of it. We will want one main template that allows sections to be turned on and off
Yup! Totally doable. You could make a choice module and affect the sections based on what is chosen.
ah ok will look at it.
